to have plenty of laughs at Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell 's expense but now they've been replaced with Michael McIntyre and David Hasselhoff . "Hoff does a great job but isn't Simon Cowell or Piers Morgan . You miss Simon Cowell because he is the best judge. He has that ability to say what you at home are thinking. Declan Donnelly added: "For me, it's just great to be able to introduce the guy from Knight Rider every day... to a backing track of the Knight Rider theme tune."

. Ordinary people have protected historic sites in other areas in Egypt, too, such as Luxor and Alexandria.
